post.title: This Blog work with 2 ID
post.body:
How this ZeroBlog was created : 
.1. It's a ZeroBlog cloned (http://127.0.0.1:43110/Blog.ZeroNetwork.bit)
.2. 3 files were modified :
data\\Name'sZeroBlog\\data\\users\\content.json
data\\Name'sZeroBlog\\data-default\\users\\content-default.json
data\\Name'sZeroBlog\\js.all
.3. Users's data : 1000k
Explanation :
http://127.0.0.1:43110/1Vp5LH4wegCaqeB72yMw2jgNdVm4aR7ET/?Topic:10_1wsuQQPTH5Ysaryn5d2ZMZJApmv7WwZ3w)
FAQ : Zeroblog : https://zeronet.readthedocs.io/en/latest/site_development/content_json/?highlight=blog
